page.title: 07LAW & ORDER-OUTWOOD AREA
page.content: THIS IS A FAIRLY LAW-ABIDING AREA WHEN COMPARED WITH SOME,ESPECIALLY CITY CENTRES.NEVERTHELESS THERE ARE MATTERS WHICH GIVE CAUSE FOR CONCERN AS FOLLOWS;{VANDALISM}-MINDLESS AND POINTLESS DAMAGE CAUSED TO PROPERTY,ESPECIALLY SCHOOLS,BY A SMALL MINORITY OF TEENAGERS,WHO SMASH WINDOWS,DESTROY EQUIPMENT,BREAK INTO BUILDING AND STEAL CASH OR SALEABLE ARTICLES.MANY PEOPLE FEEL THAT COURTS ARE TOO LENIENT WITH OFFENDERS.{ {HOUSEBREAKING}AND{PETTY THEFT}HAS BECOME FAR MORE COMMON AND OFTEN GOES UNDETECTED.PARKING AND CYCLING ON THE PAVEMENT-BOTH ARE AGAINST THE LAW,BUT LITTLE IS DONE TO STOP IT.THIS AFFECTS PEDESTRIANS AND BLIND FOLK.DISCIPLINE IN SCHOOLS IS GENERALLY GOOD BUT THERE IS A SMALL DISRUPTIVE ELEMENT AMONG TEENAGE PUPILS WHO ARE NOT USED TO DISCIPLINE IN THE HOME.
